MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report (OM) for the Kevitsa Project in Europe, Finland dated 2016.pdf

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report (OM) for the Kevitsa Project in Europe, Finland dated 2016.pdf
document.description: This report provides updated Mineral Resource and Mineral Reserve estimates, economic evaluations, and operational status of the Kevitsa Nickel Copper Mine in Lapland, Finland.
